Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameControllerExpertMode

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameControllerExpertMode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameControllerExpertMode extends GameController
This server-side class is the GameController's subclass, and offers new (overridden) methods to handle the game flow of a game in Expert mode.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • GameControllerExpertMode

      Game controller constructor.

  • Method Details

    • actionPhase

      public void actionPhase(Message message) throws TryAgainException
      Establishes the right flow of the current player's Action Phase by using the controller's variables. This overridden version has two more cases: case ACTION_CHOICE refers to those messages related to the choice between playing a Character Card and moving a student, while case CHARACTER_CARD_REPLY refers to those messages related to the Character Card handling.
      Overrides:
      actionPhase in class GameController
      Parameters:
      message - the message sent by the client.
      Throws:
      TryAgainException - if an exception cannot be caught by the controller, it is caught by the Server class.

    • handleCharacterCardChoice

      public void handleCharacterCardChoice(Message receivedMessage) throws TryAgainException, NoSuchElementException
      Allows the current player to play a Character Card, if possible. Furthermore, if there are any, sets the chosen card's parameters as specified in the message. If no exception is thrown, every player (except the current one) will be notified.
      Parameters:
      receivedMessage - the message sent by the client.
      Throws:
      NotEnoughCoinsException - if the current player cannot afford the price of the chosen card.
      CharacterCardAlreadyPlayedException - if the current player has already played a Character Card during the same round.
      CharacterCardNotFoundException - if the current player has chosen an ID that does not correspond to any of the three cards available in the game.
      TryAgainException
      NoSuchElementException

    • endPlanningPhase

      public void endPlanningPhase()
      Sets the controller's variables and the players' order so that the first player of the current round's Action Phase can play properly. This overridden version asks the next player which action to undertake next (play a card or move a student) rather than asking where to move a student.
      Overrides:
      endPlanningPhase in class GameController

    • nextPlayerActionPhase

      public void nextPlayerActionPhase()
      Resets the controller's variables in order to let the next player play his Action Phase properly. This overridden version handles one more variable, specific to the Expert mode.
      Overrides:
      nextPlayerActionPhase in class GameController

    • nextRound

      public void nextRound()
      Sets the controller's variables in order to let the players play the next round properly. This overridden version handles one more variable, specific to the Expert mode. If the game board's students' bag is empty, instantly ends the game.
      Overrides:
      nextRound in class GameController
